summary: Decisions: delay Q3 launch by one week. Action items assigned to Aditya. Key risks include dependency on the external analytics vendor.
decisions: delay Q3 launch by one week

action_items.task: follow up with the frontend team to reassess scope and timelines

risks: dependency on the external analytics vendor
assumptions: backend APIs will be ready within the revised timeline
open_questions: Do we need to cut non-critical features to meet the revised deadline?
